description:
Do you suffer from dull, yellow teeth?

Are you tired of hiding your smile in photos?

Are you looking for a fast, safe, and effective way to brighten your smile?

Do you want to avoid paying over $500 for teeth whitening at the dental office?

If you’ve answer YES to any of those questions, then this is the right course for you!

Learn the complete guide to affordable at-home teeth whitening for beginners. I will give my professional recommendations as a dental provider on the best and most effective ways to get a bright, white smile!

Content and overview

Suitable for beginners, through this course of over 21 lectures, you’ll learn everything you need to know about whitening your teeth at home.

Starting with the basics of teeth whitening, this course reviews and explains the most commonly misunderstood teeth whitening topics, such as: how at-home teeth whitening works, causes of tooth discoloration, the safety of teeth whitening and so much more.

With these basics mastered, the course will take you through my most highly recommended at-home teeth whitening products, an abundance of professionally recommended tips and tricks for preventing teeth sensitivity and staining and also the best ways to maintain long term whitening results.

By signing up for this course, you will receive lifetime access to:

  • Hands-on demonstrations
  • Diagrams
  • Pictures
  • Printable PDF documents
  • Downloadable content
  • Even access to DISCOUNTED teeth whitening products!


Students completing this course will have the knowledge to achieve a bright white smile at home, for a fraction of the cost!

What are you waiting for, enroll today!
title: At-Home Teeth Whitening: How to Easily Whiten Your Smile
